name: Swift Performance Cache Me
author: WP Fix It

sections.description:
Adds a button to the bottom of front-end pages so you can force cache creation of any site page without waiting for it to build manually.

ONLY WORKS WITH SWIFT PERFORMANCE caching plugin!

Brought to you by WP Fix It

Back when we started our business in 2009, there were very few companies that were specializing in WordPress Support. It was mostly freelancers that built WordPress sites and then had to support them.

  • Resolved our 1st ticket in 2009
  • Average resolve time 30 minutes or less
sections.installation:
1. Upload and install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Have fun caching!!!
sections.changelog:
2.2 November 14th, 2023

  • Adjust to work well with WordPress 6.4 release

2.0 May 19th, 2022

  • Get ready for WordPress 6.0

1.6 January 21st, 2020

  • Update to run on newest version of WordPress core.

1.0

  • The Initial version.

short_description: Easily force single page cache without waiting when using Swift Performance.
